entities.description: Frequency of having trouble concentrating when problems were at their worst.
Frequency of being unable to make decisions about routine things when problems were at their worst.
Frequency of feeling inferior to others nearly every day.
Frequency of feeling totally worthless nearly every day.
Frequency of feeling sad, empty, or depressed most of the day or feeling discouraged.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent had trouble concentrating due to depression.
Indicates whether the respondent had difficulty making decisions due to depression.
Indicates whether the respondent felt inferior to others most or all of the time.
Indicates whether the respondent felt worthless most or all of the time.
Indicates whether the respondent felt sad, empty, or depressed most of the day.
